title: The Week of Mallory Hernandez: Tutor of Destiny
summary: Mallory Hernandez, a 35-year-old superhero with a passion for tutoring and persuading, uncovers and foils a devious plot while balancing her everyday duties.
summaryGerman: Mallory Hernandez, eine 35-jährige Superheldin mit einer Leidenschaft für Nachhilfe und Überzeugung, entdeckt und vereitelt eine hinterhältige Verschwörung, während sie ihre alltäglichen Pflichten bewältigt.
summaryDutch: Mallory Hernandez, een 35-jarige superheldin met een passie voor bijles geven en overtuigen, ontdekt en verijdelt een sluw complot terwijl ze haar dagelijkse taken in evenwicht houdt.
summaryFrench: Mallory Hernandez, une super-héroïne de 35 ans passionnée par le tutorat et la persuasion, découvre et déjoue un complot perfide tout en jonglant avec ses obligations quotidiennes.

story.text: Mallory starts her week feeling energetic, tutoring local kids and instilling them with a love of learning and confidence.
While persuading a shy student to participate in the science fair, Mallory notices suspicious activities around the school. Her mood shifts to eerie.
Mallory investigates the suspicious figures and discovers a plot to steal the school’s new tech equipment. She feels triumphant as she gathers evidence.
Using her persuasion skills, she convinces the authorities to take action. There’s a peaceful aura as the situation seems under control.
Mallory heroically intercepts the crooks during their heist attempt. The confrontation is epic, demonstrating her dual power of intellect and strength.
The community holds a small ceremony to thank her. The mood is romantic as she is given flowers by a thankful student she helped in the past.
Reflecting on her week, Mallory feels serene. She spends time continuing her tutoring work, feeling happy to have made a difference.

moral: Knowledge and persuasion can be just as powerful as physical strength in the fight for justice.
